label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • AoE BonusGoldcomponent based on Team Net Worth difference reduced by 25%

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • AoE BonusXPcomponent based on Team XP difference reduced by 40%

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Melee lanecreepbounty reduced from 43 to 40 (-7%)

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Range lane creep bounty reduced from 48 to 45 (-6.25%)

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Hero kills (the non-net worth portions) are worth 10% more

label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• Reduced the direct hero last hit bounty by 100 and redistributed that gold into AoE gold (in ratio of 100/75/40/25/20 for 1/2/3/4/5 heroes)
    • If you are the only person contributing to a kill, you still get the same gold overall

label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• AoE Bonus Gold is now distributed based on the relative net worth amongst the heroes involved in killing the hero by +/- 25%
    • Example: If 3 heroes kill an enemy hero, and the extra AoE bounty would normally be 200 gold for each player, it is instead 200+25% for the poorest hero, 200 for the middle, and 200-25% for the richest

label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• The amount of AoE Bonus Gold given is now increased/decreased by up to 20% based on the dying hero’s relative rank in net worth amongst all the enemies on that team.
    • Example: If the total AoE gold would normally have been 600, if the hero dying is the lowest in net worth, the bounty is reduced by 20% giving only 480. If the dying hero is the highest, it is increased by 20%, giving 720

label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• Instead ofBuybacktemporarily preventing unreliable gold gain, it now reduces all gold gained (including hero and aoe gold) by 60%
    • This means that if you buyback when the enemy is pushing and you get a few kills, the amount of gold you get for that, including the networth difference bonus, is reduced by 60%

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • MeleeBarracksteam bounty increased from 175 to 275

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Ranged Barracks team bounty increased from 100 to 225

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Tier 2 and 3towersarmor reduced from 25 to 22

label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• Extra melee creeps additions spawn time changed from 17:30/34:00/50:30 to 15:00/30:00/45:00
    • This means that you will get an extra melee creep at 15 minutes instead of at 17:30

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Extra range/siege creep additions spawntime from 45:30 to 45:00

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Creeps now meet slightly closer to the Dire safelane

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Ancient Black Dragonbounty reduced from 199 to 170

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Ancient Black Drakebounty reduced from 50 to 40

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Ancient Rumblehidebounty reduced from 83 to 65

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Satyr Tormentergold bounty reduced from 104 to 84

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Hellbearhealth reduced from 950 to 700

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Hellbear bounty reduced from 65 to 50

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Ogre Frostmagebounty reduced from 52 to 40

label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• ReworkedMud Golems:
    • Mud Golems no longer haveSpell Immunity
    • Mud Golems now have 50%Magic Resistance
    • Mud Golems armor reduced from 2 to 0
    • Mud Golems now split into two smaller Mud Golems, calledShard Golems, when they die (they have 30% of the original units' health and damage, and only live for 60 seconds)
    • Mud Golems movement speed increased from 270 to 310
    • Mud Golems (and also Shard Golems) have a new active ability:Hurl Boulder(0.6 second stun, 125 damage, 30 cooldown, 800 range) They do not automatically cast this
    • Gold/XP bounties rescaled so the total value for the camp remains the same (Mud Golems 32/42 Gold/XP each, Shard Golems 13/23 each)

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Hero kills achieved by units under your control now provide XP credit to your hero (Affects things likeSpirit Bear,Golems,Familiars, etc. getting kills)

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Melee attacks now miss if the target is farther than 350 range more than their attack range

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • ReducedAll Pickdrafting time from 40 to 35 seconds per turn

label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• The following abilities no longer ignore units classified asAncients(Neutral Ancients, Warlock's Golem, etc.):Ice Vortex,Mana Void,Berserker's Call,Blood Rite,Blade Fury,Omnislash,Torrent,Ghost Ship,Smoke Screen,Static Remnant,Primal Roar,Earth Spike,Heartstopper Aura,Shrapnel, Golem'sImmolation,Sticky Napalm, Primal Split'sImmolation,Call Down, Invoker'sTornado,EMP,Chaos Meteor,Sun Strike,Ice Wall,Deafening Blast,Pulse Nova,Eclipse,Battery Assault,Rocket Flare,Shadow Poison,Dispersion,The Swarm,Kinetic Field,Static Storm,Astral Spirit,Echo Stomp,Overwhelming Odds,Stone Gaze,Earthbind,Poof,Rip Tide, Nyx'sImpale,Fire Spirits,Supernova,Mystic Flare,Dark Pact,Suicide Squad, Attack!,Ravage,Demonic Purge,Fortune's End
    • Note: This does not mean that all these spells fully affect Neutral Ancients. It still depends on the units with Ancient tag being Spell Immune or not. It primarily means that those spells have no specific rule around the Ancient flag itself.

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Damage Blockno longer affects physical spells (previously it affected some physical spells and some not)

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Cast behavior while turning to cast has been adjusted

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Reworked the Item Silencing and Passive Disabling behaviors

label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• Hex no longer applies the Break mechanic
    • AffectsScythe of Vyse,Voodoo, etc.

label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• Silenceno longer disables Invisibility
    • Previously it disabled some and not others

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • MovedRing of Health,Void Stone, andOrb of VenomfromSecret Shopto the Base

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • MovedPlatemail,Talisman of Evasion, andUltimate Orbfrom the Base to the Secret Shop

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Added Void Stone andMantle of IntelligencetoSide Shop

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Runesnow have a higher hit box priority over units

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Armor now shows decimal places in the hover tooltip

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Fixed buyback respawn timer penalty being reset if you die holdingAegis

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • The following heroes are no longer restricted from buyingBasher/Abyssal(but they are still restricted from activating Bash):Spirit Breaker,Faceless Void,Slardar, andTroll

label: Abaddon
descriptionHtml: • Borrowed Timecan now be cast while disabled (same rules asMorphling'sMorph)

label: Alchemist
descriptionHtml:
• Unstable Concoctioncountdown can now be seen by enemies
  • Unstable Concoction now has an area targeting cursor
  • Greevil's Greednow grants 4× gold bounty fromrunes
  • Alchemist can now castAghanim's Scepterto directly grant any allied hero all Aghanim's Scepter bonuses as a buff (the hero upgrade and the stat upgrade)
    • The scepter is consumed in the process
    • Multiple instances of this buff do not stack
    • Alchemist can target himself as well

label: Ancient Apparition
descriptionHtml: • Chilling Touchbuff can now be removed by clicking on the buff icon above the health bar

label: Axe
descriptionHtml:
• Berserker's Callcast point from 0.3 to 0.4
  • Counter Helixnow triggers when attacks land rather than when they start
    • AffectsCentaur Warrunner'sReturnandTimbersaw'sReactive Armoras well
  • Culling Blademovement and attack speed bonuses reduced from 40% to 30%

label: Bane
descriptionHtml:
• Brain Sapmana cost from 125/150/175/200 to 100/125/150/175
  • Units affected byNightmareno longer provide vision
  • Nightmare Endcan now be used by Bane to end all other existing Nightmares

label: Batrider
descriptionHtml:
• Flamebreakdamage changed from an instant 75/150/225/300 damage to 50 damage per second for 1/2/3/4 seconds
  • Fireflydamage reduced from 20/40/60/80 to 10/30/50/70

label: Beastmaster
descriptionHtml:
• Beastmasterbase damage increased by 4
  • Wild Axescast point from 0.5 to 0.4
  • Call of the WildBoarattack point from 0.633 to 0.5

label: Bloodseeker
descriptionHtml:
• Thirstbonuses scale from 100 to 25% HP instead of 100 to 0%
  • Thirst vision threshold from 30% health to 25%

label: Bounty Hunter
descriptionHtml:
• Bounty Hunter intelligence growth increased from 1.4 to 2
  • Shuriken Tossdamage from 100/200/250/325 to 150/225/300/375
  • Shuriken Toss cast range reduced from 650 to 400
  • Shuriken Toss mana cost from 90/115/135/155 to 120/130/140/150
  • Track's Shuriken Toss bounce range from 900 to 1200
  • Track now shows how much gold the enemy is carrying in the debuff tooltip

label: Brewmaster
descriptionHtml: • Primal Splitunits no longer provide a bounty when killed (was 11-35 depending on level)

label: Bristleback
descriptionHtml:
• Bristlebackmovement speed reduced from 295 to 290
  • Viscous Nasal Gooarmor reduction rescaled from 1/1/2/2 per stack to 1/1.4/1.8/2.2

label: Broodmother
descriptionHtml:
• Incapacitating Biteis no longer a Unique Attack Attack Modifier
  • Insatiable Hungerattack damage from 60/80/100 to 60/90/120

label: Centaur Warrunner
descriptionHtml:
• Returnnow triggers when attacks land rather than when they start
    • AffectsAxe'sCounter HelixandTimbersaw'sReactive Armoras well
  • AddedAghanim's Scepterupgrade to Centaur:Stampedereduces all incoming damage by 70% and allows allies to run through obstructions (trees, cliffs, etc.)
    • Destroys trees

label: Chaos Knight
descriptionHtml: • Chaos Boltminimum damage from 1/50/75/100 to 75/100/125/150

label: Clinkz
descriptionHtml:
• Skeleton Walkcooldown from 20 to 20/19/18/17
  • Death Pactcooldown from 45/40/35 to 45/35/25

label: Clockwerk
descriptionHtml: • Rocket Flarespeed from 1500 to 1750

label: Crystal Maiden
descriptionHtml:
• Crystal Novamovement and attack slow from -30 to -20/30/40/50
  • Crystal Nova slow duration from 3.5/4/4.5/5 to 4.5
  • Frostbitecooldown reduced from 10/9/8/7 to 9/8/7/6
  • Freezing Fieldcooldown from 150/120/90 to 90

label: Dark Seer
descriptionHtml:
• Ion Shellduration increased from 20 to 25 seconds
  • Wall of Replicadamage dealt by illusions from 70/80/90% to 60/75/90%
  • Wall of Replica duration from 15/30/45 to 45
  • Wall of Replica mana cost from 200/300/400 to 125/250/375

label: Dazzle
descriptionHtml: • Poison Touchlevel 4 damage from 32 to 36

label: Death Prophet
descriptionHtml: • Exorcismspirit count from 4/12/21 to 6/13/21

label: Disruptor
descriptionHtml: • Kinetic Fieldduration from 2.5/3/3.5/4 to 2.6/3.2/3.8/4.4

label: Dragon Knight
descriptionHtml:
• Breathe Firenow also reduces base damage by 20/25/30/35% for 8 seconds
  • Corrosive Breathdamage is now lethal
  • Elder Dragon Form'sSplash Attackdamage percentage radius from 100/200/250 (for 100/75/50% damage) to 150/225/300

label: Earth Spirit
descriptionHtml:
• Boulder Smashdamage from 125 to 50/100/150/200
  • Geomagnetic Gripmana cost from 75 to 100
  • Geomagnetic Grip damage from 50/125/200/275 to 50/100/150/200
  • Magnetizecan now be dispelled
  • FixedHexnot interruptingRolling Boulderif cast during the initial 0.6 seconds

label: Elder Titan
descriptionHtml:
• Echo Stompchannel time from 1.8 to 1.6
  • Echo Stomp cooldown from 15 to 14/13/12/11

label: Enchantress
descriptionHtml:
• Untouchableattack slow from 30/60/90/120 to 40/70/100/130
  • Enchantcan now be cast on controlled units to refresh the Enchant duration
  • Impetusnow piercesSpell Immunity

label: Enigma
descriptionHtml:
• Midnight Pulsecast point improved from 0.3 to 0.2
  • Black Holenow does a constant 55/110/165 damage per second regardless of proximity to the center
  • Black Hole mana cost from 275/350/425 to 275/325/375

label: Gyrocopter
descriptionHtml:
• Rocket Barrageno longer has a cast point (Previously had 0.3)
  • Call Downmissile two slow duration from 3 to 4

label: Huskar
descriptionHtml:
• Inner Vitalitycast range increased from 550 to 800
  • Inner Vitality cooldown from 25/22/19/16 to 22/18/14/10

label: Invoker
descriptionHtml:
• Invoker intelligence gain from 2.5 to 3.2
  • Invokeno longer triggers cooldown if it only swaps the ability slots
  • Sun Strikecooldown from 30 to 25
  • Max levelDeafening Blast(Quas, Wex, and Exort all at max level) is now a non-targetable circular wave released in every direction around Invoker

label: Io
descriptionHtml: • Relocatedouble click now teleports to fountain

label: Jakiro
descriptionHtml:
• Jakiro base strength increased from 24 to 25
  • Macropyreduration increased from 7 (14 Scepter) to 10 (20 Scepter)
  • Macropyre area of effect increased from 225 to 240

label: Juggernaut
descriptionHtml:
• Blade Furycooldown from 30/25/22/18 to 42/34/26/18
  • Blade Fury now has the sameSpell Immunityon cast dispel behavior as other Spell Immunities
    • Previously it also removed your positive buffs
  • Healing Wardmovement speed from 450 to 420
  • Omnislashno longer ministuns on cast
  • Using items/abilities in Omnislash no longer requires facing direction

label: Keeper of the Light
descriptionHtml:
• Mana Leakcooldown from 16 to 16/14/12/10
  • Chakra Magicnow adds a buff that that reduces the cooldown of the next spell its target casts by 1/2/3/4 seconds
    • Buff lasts 12 seconds
  • ScepterIlluminateheal percentage from 75% to 100%

label: Kunkka
descriptionHtml:
• Kunkka no longer turns to castTorrent
  • Torrent cooldown reduced from 12 to 10 seconds
  • X Marks The Spotmana cost from 80 to 50

label: Legion Commander
descriptionHtml:
• Moment of Couragecounterattack chance from 16/18/20/22% to 25%
  • Moment of Courage lifesteal from 20/40/60/80% to 55/65/75/85%
  • Moment of Courage cooldown from 0.9 to 2.7/2.1/1.5/0.9
  • AddedAghanim's Scepterupgrade to Legion Commander:Duellasts until either Legion Commander or her target dies
    • Ends if duelists are ever more than 2000 range apart

label: Leshrac
descriptionHtml:
• Leshrac movement speed from 315 to 320
  • Lightning Stormcast point from 0.7 to 0.6
  • Lightning Storm slow duration from 0.75 to 0.7/0.8/0.9/1

label: Lich
descriptionHtml:
• Ice Armorcast range from 800 to 1000
  • Chain Frostprojectile speed from 675 to 750

label: Lifestealer
descriptionHtml:
• Feastis now considered as normal bonus damage (can Crit and Cleave off it)
  • Open Woundslifesteal increased from 15/20/25/30% to 50%
  • AddedAghanim's Scepterupgrade to Lifestealer: Grants a new skill,Assimilate
    • Assimilate allows Lifestealer to target an allied hero and swallow them, allowing them to hide inside of Lifestealer
    • Any healing Lifestealer receives is shared with the assimilated hero
    • The assimilated hero can release itself at any time by clicking on the buff icon to erupt outward and deal 300 damage to enemies in a 700 area of effect
    • If Lifestealer dies or assimilates another hero, the currently assimilated hero will automatically exit
    • Issuing any order with your hero, a few seconds after being assimilated, will take you out

label: Lina
descriptionHtml: • Aghanim's ScepterupgradedLaguna Bladeno longer increases cast range

label: Lone Druid
descriptionHtml:
• True Formis no longer removed on death
    • Other toggle forms change as well:Medusa'sSplit ShotandMana Shield, andTroll Warlord'sBerserker's Rage
  • Battle Cryarmorincreased from 5/10/15 to 6/12/18
  • Battle Cry damage increased from 50/75/100 to 60/90/120
  • AddedAghanim's Scepterupgrade to Lone Druid: AllowsSpirit Bearto attack at any range from Lone Druid, and prevents Spirit Bear from dying if Lone Druid dies

label: Luna
descriptionHtml:
• Luna basearmorincreased by 1
  • Eclipseper unit cap increased from 4 to 5
  • ImprovedAghanim's Scepter: Allows Eclipse to be cast on an area within 2500 range
    • Grants obstructed vision of that area
    • Can also target any allied unit to center Eclipse on their location, even while moving (can double click or target Luna)

label: Medusa
descriptionHtml:
• Split ShotandMana Shieldare no longer removed on death
    • Other toggle forms change as well:Lone Druid'sTrue FormandTroll Warlord'sBerserker's Rage

label: Meepo
descriptionHtml:
• Geostrikedamage from 7/14/21/28 to 8/16/24/32
  • Divided We Standno longer causes Meepo to respawn 20% faster

label: Mirana
descriptionHtml: • Starstorm's second hit range from 175 to 325, and the second hit now strikes the unit closest to Mirana

label: Morphling
descriptionHtml:
• Adaptive Strikenow has a 1150 speed projectile
  • AddedAghanim's Scepterupgrade to Morphling: Grants a new ability,Hybrid
    • Allows morphling to target an ally, turning himself into a hybrid illusion, removing the Morphling himself
    • This hybrid illusion can cast non-ultimate abilities and has your original attributes
    • Lasts 20 seconds
    • When the duration ends or the hybrid dies, your hero emerges (cannot end prematurely)
    • Cooldown: 140, Mana cost: 200, Cast range: 600
    • Note: Ability is not available while you have aReplicateliving

label: Naga Siren
descriptionHtml:
• Ensnarecooldown from 14 to 12
  • Ensnare is now dispellable
    • Can still be cast onSpell Immuneunits
  • Ensnare is no longer removed if the target becomes Ethereal
  • AddedAghanim's Scepterupgrade:Song of the SirenScepter now regenerates you and nearby allies by 6% of maximum HP per second for up to 7 seconds

label: Nature's Prophet
descriptionHtml:
• Sproutcast range increased from 600 to 625/700/775/850
  • Sprout duration increased from 3/3.75/4.5/5.25 to 3/4/5/6
  • Nature's Calltreant base damage from 22 to 28
  • Aghanim's Scepter-upgradedWrath of Naturenow spawns a Nature's Call treant whenever it kills a unit. Killing a hero will spawn a stronger treant (3x damage and health of a normal one)

label: Night Stalker
descriptionHtml: • Voidattack speed slow increased from -35 to -50 (now matches movement speed slow)

label: Nyx Assassin
descriptionHtml:
• UsingSpiked Carapaceno longer removesVendetta
  • AddedAghanim's Scepterupgrade to Nyx: Adds a new ability,Burrow, with a one second cast time
    • While Burrowed, Nyx Assassin is invisible and unable to move/attack, but has 40% damage resistance, and regenerates 1.5% of his health and mana per second
    • Nyx Assassin's abilities also have improved properties while burrowed:Mana BurnandImpalehave 50% increased cast range, Impale Cooldown is reduced from 13 to 9, and Spiked Carapace instantly stuns any enemy units within a 300 area of effect without requiring them to hurt him first
    • Casting Vendetta causes Burrow to end

label: Omniknight
descriptionHtml: • Purificationcast point from 0.5 to 0.4

label: Oracle
descriptionHtml:
• Purifying Flamesmana cost reduced from 55/70/85/100 to 50/60/70/80
  • Purifying Flames cooldown reduced from 3 to 2.5
  • Purifying Flames can now target non-hero units
  • False Promiseno longer makes the target invisible
  • False Promise now continuously removes debuffs and disables, instead of only when first cast
  • False Promise duration from 7/8/9 to 6/7/8
  • False Promise cooldown from 20 to 80/60/40

label: Outworld Devourer
descriptionHtml:
• Aghanim's ScepterSanity's Eclipseupgrade now affects everyone in the area of effect withAstral Imprisonmentafter it deals its damage
  • Aghanim's Scepter Sanity's Eclipse upgrade no longer always triggers the mana drain and does not increase the damage multiplier by 1

label: Phoenix
descriptionHtml: • Fire Spiritsnow does an obstructed reveal of the area it hits for 1 second

label: Puck
descriptionHtml: • Waning Riftdamage increased from 70/140/210/280 to 100/160/220/280

label: Pudge
descriptionHtml: • Rotmove slow from 20% to 20/22/24/26%

label: Pugna
descriptionHtml:
• Decrepifyenemy slow from 50% to 30/40/50/60%
  • Decrepify enemy magic damage amplification from 50% to 30/40/50/60%
  • Decrepify duration from 2/2.5/3/3.5 to 3.5
  • Decrepify cooldown from 12/10/8/6 to 15/12/9/6
  • Life Draindamage and restore per second from 120/160/200 to 150/185/220
  • Life Drain cast range from 1100 to 900/1050/1200
  • Pugna'sAghanim's Scepter-upgraded Life Drain no longer increases cast range

label: Riki
descriptionHtml:
• Smoke Screenno longer slows attack speed
  • Smoke Screen now reduces turn rate by 30%

label: Rubick
descriptionHtml: • Null Fieldnow also affects creeps

label: Sand King
descriptionHtml:
• Caustic Finaleduration from 8 to 6
  • Caustic Finale now always triggers (via unit death or when its duration expires)
    • If triggered by timer expiration, it deals 30% of the damage
  • Caustic Finale no longer resets the duration on a unit that already has the debuff
  • Caustic Finale now applies a 20% move slow when the damage triggers (via unit death or when timer expires)
    • Slow lasts 3 seconds

label: Shadow Demon
descriptionHtml:
• Shadow Poisonmana cost from 50 to 40
  • Demonic PurgeAghanim's Scepterupgrade now appliesBreak(disabling passive abilities)

label: Shadow Shaman
descriptionHtml:
• Shadow Shaman base strength increased from 19 to 21
  • Shadow Shaman strength gain increased from 1.6 to 1.8

label: Silencer
descriptionHtml:
• Silencer base movement speed from 300 to 295
  • Last Wordinitial enemy cast allowance window from 5 to 4 seconds
  • Last Word no longer disarms
  • Last Word now applies a 14/16/18/20% movespeed slow whenever it triggers

label: Slardar
descriptionHtml: • Slithereen Crushdamage from 50/100/150/200 to 75/125/175/225

label: Sniper
descriptionHtml:
• Sniper agility gain from 2.9 to 2.5
  • Shrapnelrecharge time increased from 40 to 55
  • Shrapnel delay increased from 0.8 to 1.4 seconds
  • Shrapnel now gives vision when the shrapnel lands rather than instantly
  • Headshotcan now miss
  • Assassinatedamage from 355/505/655 to 320/485/650

label: Spectre
descriptionHtml: • Realityno longer kills the target illusion, it now swaps positions

label: Spirit Breaker
descriptionHtml: • Empowering Hastecooldown from 16 to 12

label: Storm Spirit
descriptionHtml:
• Storm Spirit movement speed reduced from 290 to 285
  • Ball Lightningflying vision from 1000 to 400

label: Sven
descriptionHtml: • Warcryarmorbonus increased from 4/8/12/16 to 5/10/15/20

label: Techies
descriptionHtml:
• Land Minesactivation delay reduced from 1.75 to 0.5 seconds
  • Stasis TrapActivation delay from 2 to 1.5
  • Stasis Trap Detonation delay from 2 to 1.5
  • Suicide Squad, Attack!cooldown reduced from 180/170/160/150 to 160/140/120/100
  • Minefield Signcooldown from 120 to 360
  • Minefield Sign now requires Techies to walk precisely to the targeted spot
  • Minefield Sign now has an area of effect targeting cursor
  • Minefield Sign now has a limited lifetime of 180 seconds
  • TechiesAghanim's Scepterupgrade now causes the Minefield Sign to make all Land Mines, Stasis Traps andRemote Mineswithin 125 area of effect immune toTrue Sight
    • Can only have one sign out at a time

label: Templar Assassin
descriptionHtml: • Meldcooldown from 7 to 6

label: Terrorblade
descriptionHtml:
• Reflectioncast range from 275 to 325
  • Reflection illusion outgoing damage from 40/50/60/70% to 40/60/80/100%

label: Tidehunter
descriptionHtml: • Kraken Shelldamage block increased from 10/20/30/40 to 12/24/36/48

label: Timbersaw
descriptionHtml:
• Reactive Armornow triggers when attacks land rather when attacks begin
    • AffectsAxe'sCounter HelixandCentaur Warrunner'sReturnas well
  • Reactive Armor max stacks increased from 4/8/12/16 to 5/10/15/20

label: Tinker
descriptionHtml:
• Laserhero blind duration increased from 3 to 3/3.5/4/4.5
  • Rearmmana cost from 150/250/350 to 125/225/325
  • Aghanim's ScepterLaser no longer has additional cast range
  • Aghanim's Scepter Laser now refracts to visible enemy heroes with a 550 bounce range

label: Tiny
descriptionHtml:
• Tossgrab radius increased from 250 to 275
  • Toss now grabs the closest unit rather than a random unit

label: Treant Protector
descriptionHtml: • Eyes in the Forestarea of effect reduced from 800 to 700

label: Troll Warlord
descriptionHtml:
• Berserker's Rageno longer provides +15 damage
  • RangedWhirling Axesno longer provide 800 vision
  • Melee Whirling Axes no longer provide 500 vision
  • Battle Tranceduration reduced from 7 to 5 seconds
  • Berserker’s Rage is no longer removed on death
    • Other toggle forms changed as well:Medusa'sSplit ShotandMana Shield, andLone Druid'sTrue Form

label: Tusk
descriptionHtml:
• Ice Shardsmana cost reduced from 120 to 90
  • Ice Shards cooldown from 18/16/14/12 to 19/16/13/10
  • Ice Shards vision reveal from 0.5 seconds to 2 seconds
  • Snowballspeed is now a constant 675
  • Snowball no longer auto-loads units in 100 range
  • Tusk can now add allies to Snowball while it is moving
  • AddedAghanim's Scepterto Tusk: Adds a new ability calledWalrus Kick
    • Kicks the target back 900 units
    • The kick slows by 40% for 4 seconds
    • 12 second cooldown

label: Undying
descriptionHtml:
• Soul Ripis now considered one damage instance on the enemy
  • RemovedTombstoneZombie targeting from Soul Rip
  • Tombstone Zombies now require 1 attack to kill rather than having 30 health (zombies require 2 hits from creeps)

label: Ursa
descriptionHtml: • ReworkedEnrage

label: Venomancer
descriptionHtml: • Venomous Galetick damage from 0/30/60/90 to 10/40/70/100

label: Viper
descriptionHtml: • Viper Strikecooldown reduced from 80/50/30 to 70/50/30

label: Visage
descriptionHtml:
• Gravekeeper's Cloakrecharge time from 6 to 4
  • Familiarsno longer have 300/450/600 health
  • Familiars now require 4 hero attacks to be killed (creeps/illusions do 1/4 damage, towers do 1/2)

label: Warlock
descriptionHtml:
• Fatal Bondscast range increased from 900 to 1000
  • Fatal Bonds cast time from 0.5 to 0.2
  • Chaotic OfferingGolem's health regeneration from 15/30/45 to 25/50/75

label: Weaver
descriptionHtml:
• The Swarmduration rescaled from 14/16/18/20 to 16
  • The Swarm damage from 15/20/25/30 to 20
  • The Swarm attack rate from an attack every 1.35 seconds to 1.4/1.25/1.1/0.95
  • Geminate Attacknow launches the second projectile 0.25 seconds after the initial one fires instead of after impacting the target
  • Geminate Attack no longer has a range limit
  • AddedAghanim's Scepterupgrade to Weaver: reduces the cooldown ofTime Lapseto 20 seconds and allows Time Lapse to target allied heroes
    • 1000 cast range

label: Windranger
descriptionHtml: • Shackleshotcast point from 0.3 to 0.15

label: Winter Wyvern
descriptionHtml:
• Enabled Winter Wyvern inCaptains Mode
  • ReworkedWinter's Curse
    • Those cursed to attack their ally now take 70% less damage from all sources
    • Area of effect increased from 350 to 400
    • Duration from 2.5/2.75/3 to 2.5/3/3.5
    • Cooldown from 90/80/70 to 110/100/90
  • Arctic Burnis now dispellable
  • Arctic Burn damage per second from 6% of health to 8%
  • Arctic Burn damage type from Pure to Magic
  • Arctic Burn no longer pierces Spell Immunity
  • Splinter Blastspeed increased 500➜650 (1.35 to 1 seconds max)
  • Splinter Blast debuff is now dispellable
  • Cold Embracenow behaves as normal regeneration instead of 0.1 interval heals

label: Wraith King
descriptionHtml:
• AddedAghanim's Scepterupgrade to Wraith King: Allies who are near Wraith King (within 1200 aoe) when slain become Wraiths for 5 seconds, delaying their death
    • They can continue attacking, casting, etc.
    • When the duration ends, the hero dies, and credit for the kill goes to whoever landed the original killing blow

label: Zeus
descriptionHtml:
• Thundergod's Wratharea vision reduced from 1000 to 500
  • Fixed Thundergod's Wrath sometimes hitting invisible units depending on the order of player slots.

label: Enchanted Mango
descriptionHtml: • Newconsumable

descriptionHtml: • New item formed fromPerseverance,Platemail, and arecipe

descriptionHtml: • New item formed fromMystic StaffandSoul Booster

label: Observer & Sentry Wards
descriptionHtml:
• Observer and Sentry Wards now stack into one inventory slot
    • Double clicking toggles which ward type is currently active
    • You can see the charge count of each type of ward
    • The number on the right is for the currently active ward

label: Upgraded Boots of Travel
descriptionHtml:
• Boots of Travelcan now be upgraded by purchasing the recipe again
    • Allows you to target and teleport to allied heroes

label: Skull Basher
descriptionHtml:
• Strength increased from 6 to 8
  • Damage reduced from 40 to 25
  • Bashnow deals 60 bonus damage
  • Bash cooldown increased from 2 to 2.3

label: Abyssal Blade
descriptionHtml:
• Damage reduced from 100 to 85
  • Bashnow deals 60 bonus damage
  • Bash cooldown increased from 2 to 2.3

label: Energy Booster
descriptionHtml: • Cost reduced from 1000 to 900

label: Arcane Boots
descriptionHtml:
• Replenishradius from 600 to 900
  • Replenish no longer costs 35 mana to activate

label: Bloodstone
descriptionHtml: • Recipeincreased from 800 to 900

label: Armlet of Mordiggian
descriptionHtml:
• Attack Speed from +15 to +25
  • Unholy Strengthno longer grants +10 Attack Speed
  • Unholy Strength strength gain period from 0.7 to 0.6 seconds

label: Quelling Blade
descriptionHtml:
• Changed from full damage bonus to base damage bonus
  • Quelldamage bonus from 32/12% to 40/15%
  • Quell no longer deals bonus damage to Roshan
  • Chopactive ability now kills wards rather than dealing 100 damage
  • Chop active ability range increased from 350 to 450 when targeting wards

label: Battle Fury
descriptionHtml:
• Battle Fury now requires and provides the bonuses ofQuelling Blade
  • Quellbonus is now 60% for melee heroes and 25% for ranged heroes
  • Attack damage reduced from 65 to 55
  • Cleaveradius from 250 to 280

label: Black King Bar
descriptionHtml:
• Black King Bar can now be sold
    • Repurchasing does not reset its duration

descriptionHtml: • Teleportcooldown from 50 to 45

descriptionHtml: • Armor Bonus radius increased from 750 to 900

label: Butterfly
descriptionHtml: • Flutterduration from 8 to 6 and bonus movement speed from 20 to 25%

descriptionHtml:
• Duration from 40 to 45
  • Total mana restored from 150 to 170
  • Ally cast range from 100 to 250

descriptionHtml: • Damage Blockchance increased from 67% to 75%

  • Recipecost decreased from 900 to 300

label: Diffusal Blade
descriptionHtml: • Diffusal Blade now works on ranged illusions for half the value

descriptionHtml: • Damage increased from 300 to 330

descriptionHtml: • Enduranceattack speed bonus increased from 10 to 20

descriptionHtml: • Cost reduced from 3300 to 3200

    • Remains 5 seconds for melee

  • Speed Burstspeed from 650 to 800 speed

descriptionHtml:

  • Health regeneration increased from 2% to 3.25% of total health per second
  • Regeneration disable time increased from 4 melee and 6 ranged, to 5 melee and 7 ranged

label: Linken's Sphere
descriptionHtml: • Spellblockcooldown reduced from 17 to 16

label: Magic Wand
descriptionHtml:

label: Mask of Madness
descriptionHtml: • Berserkmovement speed bonus reduced from 30% to 17%

label: Mekansm
descriptionHtml: • Restoreactive andMekansm Auraradius increased from 750 to 900

label: Mjollnir
descriptionHtml:
• Static Chargeno longer jumps to units that are invisible or in the fog of war
    • Same behavior asChain Lightning
  • Static Charge cast range increased from 600 to 800

label: Necronomicon
descriptionHtml:
• Necronomicon Warrior/Archer health from 400/600/800 to 600/700/800
  • Necronomicon Warrior damage from 25/50/75 to 45/60/75
  • Necronomicon Archer damage from 40/80/120 to 60/90/120
  • Necronomicon Archer Aura move speed from 3/6/9 to 5/7/9%

label: Observer Ward
descriptionHtml:
• Observer Wards now come in single increments
  • Cost and restock time reduced by half and stock doubled
  • Observer Wards now provide a 50 XP bounty when destroyed
  • Attacking a ward can no longer miss (same forSentry Wards)

label: Orb of Venom
descriptionHtml: • Poison Attackdamage over time can now be lethal

label: Pipe of Insight
descriptionHtml:
• Insight Auranow also provides a 10% Magic Resistance aura to nearby allies (does not affect the equipped hero)
  • Insight Aura radius increased from 750 to 900

descriptionHtml: • Attribute bonus increased from 8 to 9

label: Quarterstaff
descriptionHtml: • Cost reduced from 900 to 875

label: Radiance
descriptionHtml:

descriptionHtml: • Attacking a ward can no longer miss (same forObserver Wards)

label: Stout Shield
descriptionHtml:
• Cost reduced from 250 to 200
  • Damage Blockchance reduced from 53% to 50%
  • Damage Block blocked damage reduced from 20 (10 for ranged) to 16 (8 for ranged)

label: Tango
descriptionHtml:
• Can now be used on to eatWards
    • Eating a ward heals for double the amount, 230 HP over 16 seconds
    • Cause Wards taste better
  • Has a 450 cast range when targeting Wards

label: Town Portal Scroll
descriptionHtml:
• Teleportcooldown increased from 65 to 70
  • Teleport no longer removes Ethereal state when it is cast

label: Urn of Shadows
descriptionHtml:
• CastingSoul Releaseon an enemy already under the effects of Soul Release now refreshes the existing debuff rather than applying a separate instance
    • Same as how the heal works

label: Veil of Discord
descriptionHtml:
• Recipefrom 1250 to 1100
  • Cooldown reduced from 30 to 20
  • Duration reduced from 25 to 16
  • Mana cost reduced from 75 to 50

label: Vladmir's Offering
descriptionHtml:
• Lifestealdecreased from 16% to 15%
  • Now grants 10% lifesteal to ranged heroes
  • Now requires Headdress instead of Ring of Regeneration
    • Vladmir's Offering now provides +2 all stats, and Vladmir's Aura now provides 3 health regen
